title: Cumbernauld: town for tomorrow
creator_credit: Robin Crichton, Lionel Gale, Films of Scotland and Edinburgh Film Productions
brief_description: Portrays life in the new town of Cumbernauld, acclaimed by the world’s leading architects and town planners. Commentated by Magnus Magnusson.
